{{Wired embedded system |brand=ZISA |model=OP151S |revision=(GPON ONT) |asin=B011919928 |is_manuf=No |type=SFP Module |cpu1_brand=Intel (Lantiq) |cpu1_model=PEF98035;S729NNH6, SLLC5; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q64CW16 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16FG-AC1 |expansion_if_types=SFP |expansion_sfp_num=1 |serial=yes |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=2.5G |wan_ports=1 |flags=GPON |stock_os=Linux;3.10.12; }} {{TagLine|GPON ONU Stick - GPON SFP Module}} :[https://www.zisacom.com/admin/ewebeditor/uploadfile/20181116154842842.pdf PBrief] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/t/support-zisa-op151s-gpon-onu-lantiq-sfp-module/24102/2 ''Zisa OP151S'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums]
